verses.verse: אֵלֶּה֩ <WH428> These דִבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> These [are] the words הַבְּרִ֜ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Moses לִכְרֹ֛ת <WH3772> to make אֶת־ <WH854> with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab מִלְּבַ֣ד <WH905> alone הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> beside the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which כָּרַ֥ת <WH3772> which he made אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> at בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <WH2722> with them in Horeb פ

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> unto all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> You רְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> unto them Ye have seen אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> did יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> all that the LORD לְעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> before your eyes בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> and unto all his servants וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> and unto all his land

הַמַּסּוֹת֙ <WH4531> temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֔ת <WH1419> The great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָא֖וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> which thine eyes הָאֹתֹ֧ת <WH226> the signs וְהַמֹּפְתִ֛ים <WH4159> miracles הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> and those great הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> those

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נָתַן֩ <WH5414> hath not given יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yet the LORD לָכֶ֥ם לֵב֙ <WH3820> you an heart לָדַ֔עַת <WH3045> to perceive וְעֵינַ֥יִם <WH5869> and eyes לִרְא֖וֹת <WH7200> to see וְאָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> and ears לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <WH8085> to hear עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> have led אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> you forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not בָל֤וּ <WH1086> are not waxen old שַׂלְמֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH8008> your clothes מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> on וְנַֽעַלְךָ֥ <WH5275> upon you and thy shoe לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not בָלְתָ֖ה <WH1086> is not waxen old מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> on רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH7272> upon thy foot

לֶ֚חֶם <WH3899> bread לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֲכַלְתֶּ֔ם <WH398> Ye have not eaten וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> or strong drink לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שְׁתִיתֶ֑ם <WH8354> neither have ye drunk לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> that ye might know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> And when ye came אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> unto this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> came out סִיחֹ֣ן <WH5511> Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king חֶ֠שְׁבּוֹן <WH2809> of Heshbon וְע֨וֹג <WH5747> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king הַבָּשָׁ֧ן <WH1316> of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֛נוּ <WH7125> against לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> us unto battle וַנַּכֵּֽם׃ <WH5221> and we smote

וַנִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> And we took אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> their land וַנִּתְּנָ֣הּ <WH5414> and gave לְנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> it for an inheritance לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <WH7206> unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <WH1425> and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and to the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe הַֽמְנַשִּֽׁי׃ <WH4520> of Manasseh

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH8104> Keep אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> therefore the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> and do אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תַּשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <WH7919> them that ye may prosper אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> in all that ye do פ

אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> You נִצָּבִ֤ים <WH5324> Ye stand הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> this day כֻּלְּכֶ֔ם <WH3605> all לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> all of you before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God רָאשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <WH7218> your captains שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7626> of your tribes זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH2205> your elders וְשֹׁ֣טְרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7860> and your officers כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> [with] all the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

טַפְּכֶ֣ם <WH2945> Your little ones נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <WH802> your wives וְגֵ֣רְךָ֔ <WH1616> and thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> that [is] in מַחֲנֶ֑יךָ <WH4264> thy camp מֵחֹטֵ֣ב <WH2404> from the hewer עֵצֶ֔יךָ <WH6086> of thy wood עַ֖ד <WH5704> who שֹׁאֵ֥ב <WH7579> unto the drawer מֵימֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4325> of thy water

לְעָבְרְךָ֗ <WH5674> That thou shouldest enter בִּבְרִ֛ית <WH1285> into covenant יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God וּבְאָלָת֑וֹ <WH423> and into his oath אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God כֹּרֵ֥ת <WH3772> maketh עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> with thee this day

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> order הָקִֽים־ <WH6965> That he may establish אֹתְךָ֩ <WH853> הַיּ֨וֹם ׀ <WH3117> thee to day ל֜וֹ לְעָ֗ם <WH5971> for a people וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לְּךָ֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto himself and [that] he may be unto thee a God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he hath said לָ֑ךְ וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> to you נִשְׁבַּע֙ <WH7650> unto thee and as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> and to Jacob

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for לְבַדְּכֶ֑ם <WH905> alone אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I כֹּרֵת֙ <WH3772> Neither with you only do I make אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָלָ֖ה <WH423> and this oath הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH854> for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יֶשְׁנ֜וֹ <WH3426> here with us this פֹּ֗ה <WH6311> here עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH5973> with עֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> But with [him] that standeth הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> day לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וְאֵ֨ת <WH854> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <WH369> else פֹּ֖ה <WH6311> here עִמָּ֥נוּ <WH5973> with הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> and also with [him] that [is] not here with us this day

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> (For ye know אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> how יָשַׁ֖בְנוּ <WH3427> how we have dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and how עָבַ֛רְנוּ <WH5674> and how we came בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> through הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֲבַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH5674> which ye passed by

וַתִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> And ye have seen אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁקּ֣וּצֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8251> their abominations וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> גִּלֻּלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1544> and their idols עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> wood וָאֶ֔בֶן <WH68> and stone כֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עִמָּהֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with

פֶּן־ <WH6435> so יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> Lest there should be בָּ֠כֶם אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> among you man אוֹ־ <WH176> or אִשָּׁ֞ה <WH802> or woman א֧וֹ <WH176> or מִשְׁפָּחָ֣ה <WH4940> or family אוֹ־ <WH176> or שֵׁ֗בֶט <WH7626> or tribe אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whose לְבָב֨וֹ <WH3824> whose heart פֹנֶ֤ה <WH6437> turneth away הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> this day מֵעִם֙ <WH5973> from יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> from the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to go לַעֲבֹ֔ד <WH5647> [and] serve אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> the gods הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> of these nations הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> of those פֶּן־ <WH6435> so יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> lest there should be בָּכֶ֗ם שֹׁ֛רֶשׁ <WH8328> among you a root פֹּרֶ֥ה <WH6509> that beareth רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7219> gall וְלַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3939> and wormwood

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> have בְּשָׁמְעוֹ֩ <WH8085> And it come to pass when he heareth אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> the words הָֽאָלָ֜ה <WH423> of this curse הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> he וְהִתְבָּרֵ֨ךְ <WH1288> that he bless בִּלְבָב֤וֹ <WH3824> himself in his heart לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> I shall have peace יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> have לִּ֔י כִּ֛י <WH3588> though בִּשְׁרִר֥וּת <WH8307> in the imagination לִבִּ֖י <WH3820> of mine heart אֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> walk לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order סְפ֥וֹת <WH5595> to add הָרָוָ֖ה <WH7302> drunkenness אֶת־ <WH853> הַצְּמֵאָֽה׃ <WH6771> to thirst

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall never יֹאבֶ֣ה <WH14> will יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD סְלֹ֣חַֽ <WH5545> not spare לוֹ֒ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָ֠ז <WH227> for יֶעְשַׁ֨ן <WH6225> shall smoke אַף־ <WH639> him but then the anger יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְקִנְאָתוֹ֙ <WH7068> and his jealousy בָּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> against that man הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְרָ֤בְצָה <WH7257> shall lie בּוֹ֙ כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הָ֣אָלָ֔ה <WH423> and all the curses הַכְּתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> that are written בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וּמָחָ֤ה <WH4229> shall blot out יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> upon him and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> his name מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> from under heaven

וְהִבְדִּיל֤וֹ <WH914> shall separate יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> him unto evil מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all אָל֣וֹת <WH423> according to all the curses הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <WH3789> that are written בְּסֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> in this book הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> of the law הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְאָמַ֞ר <WH559> shall say הַדּ֣וֹר <WH1755> So that the generation הָֽאַחֲר֗וֹן <WH314> to come בְּנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> of your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> that shall rise up מֵאַ֣חֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <WH310> after וְהַ֨נָּכְרִ֔י <WH5237> you and the stranger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יָבֹ֖א <WH935> that shall come מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land רְחוֹקָ֑ה <WH7350> from a far וְ֠רָאוּ <WH7200> when they see אֶת־ <WH853> מַכּ֞וֹת <WH4347> the plagues הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> of that land הַהִוא֙ <WH1931> he וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּ֣חֲלֻאֶ֔יהָ <WH8463> and the sicknesses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which חִלָּ֥ה <WH2470> hath laid יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD בָּֽהּ׃

גָּפְרִ֣ית <WH1614> thereof [is] brimstone וָמֶלַח֮ <WH4417> and salt שְׂרֵפָ֣ה <WH8316> [and] burning כָל־ <WH3605> All אַרְצָהּ֒ <WH776> [And that] the whole land לֹ֤א <WH3808> is not תִזָּרַע֙ <WH2232> [that] it is not sown וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תַצְמִ֔חַ <WH6779> nor beareth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> groweth בָ֖הּ כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֵ֑שֶׂב <WH6212> nor any grass כְּֽמַהְפֵּכַ֞ת <WH4114> therein like the overthrow סְדֹ֤ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָה֙ <WH6017> and Gomorrah אַדְמָ֣ה <WH126> Admah [וּצְבֹיִּים כ] (וּצְבֹויִ֔ם <WH6636> Zeboiim ק) אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> overthrew יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD בְּאַפּ֖וֹ <WH639> in his anger וּבַחֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH2534> and in his wrath

וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> shall say כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> Even all nations עַל־ <WH5921> and מֶ֨ה <WH4100> how long עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> done יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Wherefore hath the LORD כָּ֖כָה <WH3602> after that manner לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> common הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise מֶ֥ה <WH4100> how long חֳרִ֛י <WH2750> outburst הָאַ֥ף <WH639> anger הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְאָ֣מְר֔וּ <WH559> Then men shall say עַ֚ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָֽזְב֔וּ <WH5800> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which כָּרַ֣ת <WH3772> which he made עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> with בְּהוֹצִיא֥וֹ <WH3318> with them when he brought them forth אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt
